thread.title: Canada's Internet community to convene in Vancouver
thread.title_full: Canada's Internet community to convene in Vancouver

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Canada's Internet community to convene in Vancouver
text:
Canada's Internet community to convene in Vancouver Adv: 
Aug 05, 2015 Adv: 
VANCOUVER, Canada - Canadians Connected 2015 is an opportunity for Canada's Internet community to learn from some of Canada's top digital thinkers and gain insight on CIRA's latest initiatives to advance the Internet in Canada. 
Canadians Connected 2015: CIRA Symposium and Annual General Meeting September 16, 2015 1055 Canada Place, room 211 
This event is free and will be available online by webcast. 
Canadians Connected will feature high-profile Canadian speakers including business transformation and digital marketing expert Mitch Joel and CBC dragon, investor & business expert Michael Hyatt, who will share their knowledge about business and digital technology. Attendees will have the opportunity to shape Canada's digital future online by getting involved in the governance of an organization that now more than ever represents Canadian values online. 
By participating in the event, .CA Members can have a direct impact on the future of the Internet in Canada by voting on items of business. While anyone can attend, only .CA Members can vote at the AGM or in the upcoming 2015 Board of Directors election.
